title: bug updating
body:
Unknown error has ocurred. Please check the logs for more information" and when i close the window the patcher is not scanning any filles.

tried to re install and nothing happend :s cant some 1 help me  {{item:3070}}  {{item:3070}}  {{item:3070}}  {{item:3070}}  {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
Are you still having this issue? If so, I recommend working through the steps outlined in our [Patching Issues guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues) Most of the time, issues patching are caused by either permissions configurations or a poor connection to the patching servers. This guide goes over the most common solutions for these issues.

Let me know if you continue to have this issue after taking those steps.
